journeys.title: User journey A
journeys.subtitle: Jane wants to make new campaign content available to her local market resellers. Jane cannot publish content, but John can do it for her.

steps.description: Jane performs a search for the content she wants to make available
Jane identified the content she wants to make available
Jane indicates that she wants to share the content with John
Jane shares the content with John, along with an additional message containing her request to publish the content
John gets notified that Jane shared content with him
John clicks a call-to-action in the notification to see the content & message Jane shared with him
John shares the content with the target audience
Jane gets notified that John shared the content
